name: Toplinker
short_description: It's a set of two scripts one that goes on for as long as you allow it to find all the links it can through a given url and then saves all the links into .txt file. The second script sorts all the links in increasing popularity by the number of occurrences of each url and then saves the list of urls in a different .txt file with no repeats and the number occurrences next to the link. Both scripts need to be in the same directory to work.
summary: A simple way to find the most popular links on a site
